about.summary: Geostatistical analysis including variogram-based, likelihood-based and Bayesian methods. Software companion for Diggle and Ribeiro (2007) <doi:10.1007/978-0-387-48536-2>.

name: r-geor
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.8-1' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-geor
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/geoR_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/geoR/geoR_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 990647804590b925a50f72897b24bbabd331cebef0be1696a60528b2f79d6fd3
  patches:
    # https://github.com/rocker-org/rocker/issues/213#issuecomment-278909502
    - no_tcltk.patch

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 1
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}              # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_c') }}        # [win]
    - {{ posix }}filesystem        # [win]
    - {{ posix }}make
    - {{ posix }}sed               # [win]
    - {{ posix }}coreutils         # [win]
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-randomfields
    - r-sp
    - r-splancs
  run:
    - r-base
    - {{ native }}gcc-libs         # [win]
    - r-mass
    - r-randomfields
    - r-sp
    - r-splancs

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('geoR')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('geoR')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://www.leg.ufpr.br/geoR
  license: GPL-2
  summary: Geostatistical analysis including variogram-based, likelihood-based and Bayesian methods.
    Software companion for Diggle and Ribeiro (2007) <doi:10.1007/978-0-387-48536-2>.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - ocefpaf

# Package: geoR
# Version: 1.8-1
# Date: 2020-02-08
# Title: Analysis of Geostatistical Data
# LazyLoad: yes
# LazyData: yes
# Author: Paulo J. Ribeiro Jr [aut, cre] <paulojus@ufpr.br>, Peter J. Diggle [aut, cre] <p.diggle@lancaster.ac.uk> Ole Christensen [ctb], Martin Schlather [ctb], Roger Bivand [ctb], Brian Ripley [ctb]
# Maintainer: Paulo J. Ribeiro Jr <paulojus@ufpr.br>
# Depends: R (>= 2.10), stats, methods
# Imports: MASS, sp, splancs, RandomFields, graphics
# Suggests: scatterplot3d, lattice, tcltk
# Description: Geostatistical analysis including variogram-based, likelihood-based and Bayesian methods. Software companion for Diggle and Ribeiro (2007) <doi:10.1007/978-0-387-48536-2>.
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# URL: http://www.leg.ufpr.br/geoR
# NeedsCompilation: yes
# Packaged: 2020-02-10 15:55:46 UTC; paulojus
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2020-02-10 21:00:02 UTC
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.0
